document_data.name: Levast River
document_data.mainbody: '''Levast River''' was a river in eastern [[Tethyr]] that was a tributary of the [[Idolflow]].
document_data.Etymology: The river was believed to have been named after a [[Dwarf|dwarven]] clansman.
document_data.Geography: Levast River fed the shorter Idolflow.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some dwarves believed that an offshoot of the river broke off and became subterranean, perhaps even entering the ancient realm of [[Shanatar]].
